item.description:
the movie "Lincoln" http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0443272/ is now at the Chunkys cinema in Nashua, so for those of you like me that haven't yet seen it, Let's meet and enjoy some pre-movie chatting, munchies/food/popcorn..., and then watch Daniel Day-Lewis & Sally Field aka Abraham & Mary Lincoln.

Monday's at Chunkys is Bargain Night! everyone receives $2.00 off the admission!

OR if you are a member of the Chunky's Email Club, Check your emails cause As a special Holiday present to all their subscribers, they sent out a FREE Admission email to print and present to the ticket staff on Monday 12/17 only.  * One coupon per subscriber.

and I have 2 coupons for FREE Popcorn, to Share!
item.how_to_find_us: 6PM at ticket counter or after 6:15pm at table - look for meetup sign

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Rainy night at the Movies
